arabicText: فَمَن تَوَلَّىٰ بَعْدَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْفَـٰسِقُونَ
englishTranslationText: So	those	who	turn	away	after	this	- it	is	they	who	are	the	sinners
romanUrduTranslationText: To	jo	koi	iske	b’ad	phire	to	wahi	log	fāsiq	haiñ

arabicText: أَفَغَيْرَ دِينِ ٱللَّهِ يَبْغُونَ وَلَهُۥٓ أَسْلَمَ مَن فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ طَوْعًۭا وَكَرْهًۭا وَإِلَيْهِ يُرْجَعُونَ
englishTranslationText:
So	 do	 they	 desire	 a	 religion	 other	 than	 the	 religion	 of	Allah,	 whereas	 to	 Him	 has	 submitted	
whoever	 is	 in	 the	 heavens	 and	 the	 earth,	 willingly	 or	 grudgingly,	 and	 it	 is	 to	 Him	 they	 will	
return?
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	kya	Allah	ke	deen	ke	siwa	aur	deen	chāhte	haiñ	aur	usi	ke	huzoor	gardan	rakhe	haiñ	jo	koi	
āsmanoñ	aur	zameen	meiñ	haiñ	khushi	se	aur	majboori	se	aur	usi	ki	taraf	phireñge.

arabicText: قُلْ ءَامَنَّا بِٱللَّهِ وَمَآ أُنزِلَ عَلَيْنَا وَمَآ أُنزِلَ عَلَىٰٓ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ وَإِسْمَـٰعِيلَ وَإِسْحَـٰقَ وَيَعْقُوبَ وَٱلْأَسْبَاطِ وَمَآ أُوتِىَ مُوسَىٰ وَعِيسَىٰ وَٱلنَّبِيُّونَ مِن رَّبِّهِمْ لَا نُفَرِّقُ بَيْنَ أَحَدٍۢ مِّنْهُمْ وَنَحْنُ لَهُۥ مُسْلِمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Say,	“We	believe	in	Allah and	what	is	sent	
down	 to	 us	 and	 what	 was	 sent	 down	 to	
Ibrahim,	 and	 Ismael,	 and	 Ishaq,	 and	
Yaqub	 (Jacob)	 and	 their	 sons,	 and	 that	
which	 came	 to	 Moosa	 and	 Eisa	 and	 the	
Prophets,	 from	 their	 Lord;	 we	 do	 not	
make	 any	 distinction,	 in	 belief,	 between	
any	 of	 them,	 and	 to	 Him	 we	 have	
submitted	ourselves.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yuñ	kaho	ke	ham	Imān	lāye	Allah	par	aur	
us	 par	 jo	 hamāri	 taraf	 utra	 aur	 jo	 utra	
Ibrāheem aur	Ismāeel aur	Ishāq aur	Ya‘qūb
aur	un	ke	betoñ	par	aur	jo	kuch	mila	Mūsa
aur	Īsa aur	Ambiya	ko	un	ke	Rab	se,	ham	
un	 meiñ	 kisi	 par	 Imān	 meiñ	 farq	 nahi	
karte	 aur	 hum	 usi	 ke	 huzoor	 gardan	
jhukāye	haiñ.

arabicText: وَمَن يَبْتَغِ غَيْرَ ٱلْإِسْلَـٰمِ دِينًۭا فَلَن يُقْبَلَ مِنْهُ وَهُوَ فِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ مِنَ ٱلْخَـٰسِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 if	 one	 seeks	 a	 religion	 other	 than	
Islam,	it	will	never	be	accepted	from	him;	
and	 he	 is	 among	 the	 losers	 in	 the	
Hereafter.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 jo	 islām	 ke	 siwa	 koi	 deen	 chāhe	 ga	
woh	 hargiz	 us	 se	 qabool	 na	 kiya	 jāye	 ga	
aur	 woh	 ākhirat	 meiñ	 ziyāñ	 kāroñ	
(Nuqsān	uthāne	wala)	se	hai

arabicText: كَيْفَ يَهْدِى ٱللَّهُ قَوْمًۭا كَفَرُوا۟ بَعْدَ إِيمَـٰنِهِمْ وَشَهِدُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱلرَّسُولَ حَقٌّۭ وَجَآءَهُمُ ٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتُ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يَهْدِى ٱلْقَوْمَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Why	 should	 Allah will	 guidance	 for	 the	
people	who	disbelieved,	after	their	having	
accepted	 faith	 and	 bearing	 witness	 that	
the	 Noble	 Messenger	 is	 a	 true	 one,	 and	
after	 clear	 signs	 had	 come	 to	 them?	 And	
Allah does	not	guide	the	unjust.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kyuñ	kar	Allah	aisi	qaum	ki	hidāyat	chāhe	
jo	 Imān	lākar	 kafir	 ho	 gye	 aur	 gawāhi	 de	
chuke	 they	 ke	 Rasool	 sachcha	 hai	 aur	
unheiñ	 khuli	 nishāniyāñ	 āa	 chuki	 theiñ	
aur	Allah	zālimoñ	ko	hidāyat	nahi	karta

arabicText: كَيْفَ يَهْدِى ٱللَّهُ قَوْمًۭا كَفَرُوا۟ بَعْدَ إِيمَـٰنِهِمْ وَشَهِدُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱلرَّسُولَ حَقٌّۭ وَجَآءَهُمُ ٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتُ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يَهْدِى ٱلْقَوْمَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Why	 should	 Allah will	 guidance	 for	 the	
people	who	disbelieved,	after	their	having	
accepted	 faith	 and	 bearing	 witness	 that	
the	 Noble	 Messenger	 is	 a	 true	 one,	 and	
after	 clear	 signs	 had	 come	 to	 them?	 And	
Allah does	not	guide	the	unjust.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kyuñ	kar	Allah	aisi	qaum	ki	hidāyat	chāhe	
jo	 Imān	lākar	 kafir	 ho	 gye	 aur	 gawāhi	 de	
chuke	 they	 ke	 Rasool	 sachcha	 hai	 aur	
unheiñ	 khuli	 nishāniyāñ	 āa	 chuki	 theiñ	
aur	Allah	zālimoñ	ko	hidāyat	nahi	karta

arabicText: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ جَزَآؤُهُمْ أَنَّ عَلَيْهِمْ لَعْنَةَ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ وَٱلنَّاسِ أَجْمَعِينَ
englishTranslationText:
The	recompense	of	such	is	that	on	them	is	
the	curse	of	Allah and	of	the	angels	and	of	
men	combined.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Unka	 badla	 yeh	 hai	 ke	 un	 par	 la'nat	 hai	
Allah	aur	Firishtoñ	aur	ādmiyoñ	sab	ki.

arabicText: خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا لَا يُخَفَّفُ عَنْهُمُ ٱلْعَذَابُ وَلَا هُمْ يُنظَرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Remaining	in	it	forever;	their	punishment	
will	not	be	lightened,	nor	will	they	get	any	
respite.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Hamesha	 us	 meiñ	 raheiñ	 na	 un	 par	 se	
ázāb	 halka	 ho	 aur	 na	 unheiñ	 mohlat	 di	
jāye.

arabicText: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ تَابُوا۟ مِنۢ بَعْدِ ذَٰلِكَ وَأَصْلَحُوا۟ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌۭ رَّحِيمٌ
englishTranslationText:
Except	those	who	repented	thereafter	and	
reformed	themselves;	then	indeed	Allah is	
Oft	Forgiving,	Most	Merciful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Magar	 jinhoñ	 ne	 us	 ke	 b’ad	 tauba	 ki	 aur	
āpā	(khud	ko) sambhāla	to	zaroor	Allah	bakhsh	ne	wāla	meharbān	hai.

arabicText: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ تَابُوا۟ مِنۢ بَعْدِ ذَٰلِكَ وَأَصْلَحُوا۟ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌۭ رَّحِيمٌ
englishTranslationText:
Except	those	who	repented	thereafter	and	
reformed	themselves;	then	indeed	Allah is	
Oft	Forgiving,	Most	Merciful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Magar	 jinhoñ	 ne	 us	 ke	 b’ad	 tauba	 ki	 aur	
āpā	(khud	ko) sambhāla	to	zaroor	Allah	bakhsh	ne	wāla	meharbān	hai.

arabicText: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بَعْدَ إِيمَـٰنِهِمْ ثُمَّ ٱزْدَادُوا۟ كُفْرًۭا لَّن تُقْبَلَ تَوْبَتُهُمْ وَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلضَّآلُّونَ
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	those	who	disbelieve	after	having	accepted faith,	and	advance	further	in	their	disbelief	-
their	repentance	will	never	be	accepted;	and	it	is	they	who	are	the	astray.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Beshak	woh	jo	 Imān	lākar	 kafir	 huwe	 phir	aur	 kufr	meiñ	 badhe	 unki	 tauba	 hargiz	 qabool	 na	
hogi	aur	wohi	haiñ	bahke	huwe

arabicText: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَمَاتُوا۟ وَهُمْ كُفَّارٌۭ فَلَن يُقْبَلَ مِنْ أَحَدِهِم مِّلْءُ ٱلْأَرْضِ ذَهَبًۭا وَلَوِ ٱفْتَدَىٰ بِهِۦٓ ۗ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌۭ وَمَا لَهُم مِّن نَّـٰصِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Those	who	disbelieved	and	died	as	disbelievers	- an	earth	 full	 of	gold	will	never	 be	accepted	
from	any	one	of	them,	even	if	he	offers	it,	for	his	freedom;	for	them	is	a	painful	punishment	and	
they	do	not	have	any	aides.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Woh	jo	kāfir	huwe	aur	kāfir	hi	mare	un	meiñ	kisi	se	zameen	bhar	sona	hargiz	qabool	na	kiya	
jāyega	agarche	apni	khalāsi	ko	de	un	ke	liye	dard-nāk	azāb	hai	aur	unka	[koi]	yār	nahi.
